description:
Used to set hotkeys for the [field.image-annotation](field.image-annotation.md) component.

You can set hotkeys to select area types and selection modes and to confirm or cancel area creation. When setting hotkeys, you can use the up and down arrows (`up`,`down`), numbers, and Latin letters.

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/rDD6zD5S3tyzeb)
properties.cancel.description: Keyboard shortcut for canceling area creation.
properties.confirm.description: Keyboard shortcut for confirming area creation.
properties.labels.description: Keyboard shortcuts for choosing area types. They're assigned to buttons in the order they are shown if you enabled the option to choose multiple area types.
properties.modes.description: Keyboard shortcuts for choosing selection modes.
properties.modes.properties.point.descri: Keyboard shortcut for selecting areas using points.
properties.modes.properties.polygon.desc: Keyboard shortcut for selecting areas using polygons.
properties.modes.properties.rectangle.de: Keyboard shortcut for selecting areas using rectangles.
properties.modes.properties.select.descr: Keyboard shortcut for selecting shapes and points.
